column1: She attended Pilot Knob Grade School and Diamond Grade School (both one-room schools)
column3: and graduated from Adams-Friendship High School in 1966. She received a diploma in Nursing from Mount Sinai Hospital School of Nursing in 1969; a B.S.N.
column5: from Rush University College of Nursing in 1977; and a M.A. from Roosevelt University in 1987.
